roleset.name: make a rattling sound

example.name: All arguments
example.text: She clacked her shoes on the deep gray tile.

example.name: Theme as subject
example.text: The branches clacked together like the bones of the dead.
example.arg: like the bones of the dead.

roleset.note: Roleset by Julia based on internet search. Member of Vncls sound_emission-43.2.

roleset.name: make a clacking sound (like a hen)

example.name: with hearer
example.text: [The Yuzzem]-1 gibbered and *-1 clacked at him, but finally moved away.

example.name: with utterance
example.text: The little red hen clacked, “I am grateful, for now they recognize the importance of doing real work."
example.arg: "I am grateful, for now they recognize the importance of doing real work."

roleset.note: Roleset by Julia based on internet search. No Vncls. Comparison to ‘neigh’.

roleset.name: prattle on rapidly and incessantly

example.name: With speaker and topic
example.text: These doe-eyed old ladies are clacking about how hard my life must have been.
example.arg: about how hard my life must have been.

example.name: With both theme and topic
example.text: The press gallery members have been clacking their tongues over this "scandal".

roleset.note: Roleset by Julia based on internet search. No VNcls.
